body:
Running a Guix build of master (531c2b7c04898f5a2097f44e8c12bfb2f53aaf9b) using:
```bash
time BASE_CACHE="/guix/base_cache" SOURCES_PATH="/guix/sources" SDK_PATH="/guix/SDKs" HOSTS="aarch64-linux-gnu" ./contrib/guix/guix-build
```
on aarch64 hardware (Alpine Docker container, running on Apple M1) currently fails when building `gcc-cross-sans-libc-aarch64-linux-gnu-7.5.0.drv` with the following:
```bash
substitute: updating substitutes from 'https://guix.carldong.io'... 100.0%
substitute: updating substitutes from 'https://ci.guix.gnu.org'... 100.0%
The following derivations will be built:
   /gnu/store/q21qdh52byk52jrh42dyqsk6zar0hyvd-profile.drv
   /gnu/store/bg0382gxs64q6pdn6ar4ppclxgs527vc-aarch64-linux-gnu-toolchain-8.4.0.drv
   /gnu/store/kci19xba5jk35imc2pf5wky653f92fvl-linux-libre-headers-cross-aarch64-linux-gnu-5.4.94.drv
   /gnu/store/nc7814bwf767941rs647fnjkpl7nwiyi-gcc-cross-sans-libc-aarch64-linux-gnu-7.5.0.drv
   /gnu/store/xsyx0fj497lzvbrb1i72sca4j7wrz6b0-glibc-cross-aarch64-linux-gnu-2.24.drv
   /gnu/store/y4ds6wp0k7dm7l4ixx4x162aba2jihk0-gcc-cross-aarch64-linux-gnu-8.4.0.drv

building /gnu/store/nc7814bwf767941rs647fnjkpl7nwiyi-gcc-cross-sans-libc-aarch64-linux-gnu-7.5.0.drv...
\ 'build' phasenote: keeping build directory `/tmp/guix-build-gcc-cross-sans-libc-aarch64-linux-gnu-7.5.0.drv-1'
builder for `/gnu/store/nc7814bwf767941rs647fnjkpl7nwiyi-gcc-cross-sans-libc-aarch64-linux-gnu-7.5.0.drv' failed with exit code 1
build of /gnu/store/nc7814bwf767941rs647fnjkpl7nwiyi-gcc-cross-sans-libc-aarch64-linux-gnu-7.5.0.drv failed
View build log at '/var/log/guix/drvs/nc/7814bwf767941rs647fnjkpl7nwiyi-gcc-cross-sans-libc-aarch64-linux-gnu-7.5.0.drv.bz2'.
cannot build derivation `/gnu/store/xsyx0fj497lzvbrb1i72sca4j7wrz6b0-glibc-cross-aarch64-linux-gnu-2.24.drv': 1 dependencies couldn't be built
cannot build derivation `/gnu/store/kci19xba5jk35imc2pf5wky653f92fvl-linux-libre-headers-cross-aarch64-linux-gnu-5.4.94.drv': 1 dependencies couldn't be built
cannot build derivation `/gnu/store/q21qdh52byk52jrh42dyqsk6zar0hyvd-profile.drv': 1 dependencies couldn't be built
guix environment: error: build of `/gnu/store/q21qdh52byk52jrh42dyqsk6zar0hyvd-profile.drv' failed

# <snip>

g++ -std=gnu++98 -fno-PIE -c  -DIN_GCC_FRONTEND -g -O2 -DIN_GCC     -fno-exceptions -fno-rtti -fasynchronous-unwind-tables -W -Wall -Wno-narrowing -Wwrite-strings -Wcast-qual -Wno-format -Wmissing-format-attribute -Woverloaded-virtual -pedantic -Wno-long-long -Wno-variadic-macros -Wno-overlength-strings -fno-common  -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I. -I../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc -I../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc/. -I../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc/../include -I../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc/../libcpp/include  -I../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc/../libdecnumber -I../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc/../libdecnumber/dpd -I../libdecnumber -I../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc/../libbacktrace   -o cc1-checksum.o -MT cc1-checksum.o -MMD -MP -MF ./.deps/cc1-checksum.TPo cc1-checksum.c
g++ -std=gnu++98 -no-pie   -g -O2 -DIN_GCC     -fno-exceptions -fno-rtti -fasynchronous-unwind-tables -W -Wall -Wno-narrowing -Wwrite-strings -Wcast-qual -Wno-format -Wmissing-format-attribute -Woverloaded-virtual -pedantic -Wno-long-long -Wno-variadic-macros -Wno-overlength-strings -fno-common  -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -static-libstdc++ -static-libgcc  -o cc1 c/c-lang.o c-family/stub-objc.o attribs.o c/c-errors.o c/c-decl.o c/c-typeck.o c/c-convert.o c/c-aux-info.o c/c-objc-common.o c/c-parser.o c/c-array-notation.o c/c-fold.o c/gimple-parser.o c-family/c-common.o c-family/c-cppbuiltin.o c-family/c-dump.o c-family/c-format.o c-family/c-gimplify.o c-family/c-indentation.o c-family/c-lex.o c-family/c-omp.o c-family/c-opts.o c-family/c-pch.o c-family/c-ppoutput.o c-family/c-pragma.o c-family/c-pretty-print.o c-family/c-semantics.o c-family/c-ada-spec.o c-family/c-cilkplus.o c-family/array-notation-common.o c-family/cilk.o c-family/c-ubsan.o c-family/c-attribs.o c-family/c-warn.o aarch64-c.o glibc-c.o \
  cc1-checksum.o libbackend.a main.o libcommon-target.a libcommon.a ../libcpp/libcpp.a ../libdecnumber/libdecnumber.a libcommon.a ../libcpp/libcpp.a   ../libbacktrace/.libs/libbacktrace.a ../libiberty/libiberty.a ../libdecnumber/libdecnumber.a  -lisl -lmpc -lmpfr -lgmp -rdynamic -ldl  -lz
g++ -std=gnu++98 -fno-PIE -c  -DIN_GCC_FRONTEND -g -O2 -DIN_GCC     -fno-exceptions -fno-rtti -fasynchronous-unwind-tables -W -Wall -Wno-narrowing -Wwrite-strings -Wcast-qual -Wno-format -Wmissing-format-attribute -Woverloaded-virtual -pedantic -Wno-long-long -Wno-variadic-macros -Wno-overlength-strings -fno-common  -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I. -I../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc -I../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc/. -I../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc/../include -I../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc/../libcpp/include  -I../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc/../libdecnumber -I../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc/../libdecnumber/dpd -I../libdecnumber -I../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc/../libbacktrace   -o cc1plus-checksum.o -MT cc1plus-checksum.o -MMD -MP -MF ./.deps/cc1plus-checksum.TPo cc1plus-checksum.c
g++ -std=gnu++98 -no-pie   -g -O2 -DIN_GCC     -fno-exceptions -fno-rtti -fasynchronous-unwind-tables -W -Wall -Wno-narrowing -Wwrite-strings -Wcast-qual -Wno-format -Wmissing-format-attribute -Woverloaded-virtual -pedantic -Wno-long-long -Wno-variadic-macros -Wno-overlength-strings -fno-common  -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -static-libstdc++ -static-libgcc  -o cc1plus \
      cp/cp-lang.o c-family/stub-objc.o cp/call.o cp/decl.o cp/expr.o cp/pt.o cp/typeck2.o cp/class.o cp/decl2.o cp/error.o cp/lex.o cp/parser.o cp/ptree.o cp/rtti.o cp/typeck.o cp/cvt.o cp/except.o cp/friend.o cp/init.o cp/method.o cp/search.o cp/semantics.o cp/tree.o cp/repo.o cp/dump.o cp/optimize.o cp/mangle.o cp/cp-objcp-common.o cp/name-lookup.o cp/cxx-pretty-print.o cp/cp-cilkplus.o cp/cp-gimplify.o cp/cp-array-notation.o cp/lambda.o cp/vtable-class-hierarchy.o cp/constexpr.o cp/cp-ubsan.o cp/constraint.o cp/logic.o attribs.o incpath.o c-family/c-common.o c-family/c-cppbuiltin.o c-family/c-dump.o c-family/c-format.o c-family/c-gimplify.o c-family/c-indentation.o c-family/c-lex.o c-family/c-omp.o c-family/c-opts.o c-family/c-pch.o c-family/c-ppoutput.o c-family/c-pragma.o c-family/c-pretty-print.o c-family/c-semantics.o c-family/c-ada-spec.o c-family/c-cilkplus.o c-family/array-notation-common.o c-family/cilk.o c-family/c-ubsan.o c-family/c-attribs.o c-family/c-warn.o aarch64-c.o glibc-c.o cc1plus-checksum.o libbackend.a main.o libcommon-target.a libcommon.a ../libcpp/libcpp.a ../libdecnumber/libdecnumber.a libcommon.a ../libcpp/libcpp.a   ../libbacktrace/.libs/libbacktrace.a ../libiberty/libiberty.a ../libdecnumber/libdecnumber.a  -lisl -lmpc -lmpfr -lgmp -rdynamic -ldl  -lz
echo | /tmp/guix-build-gcc-cross-sans-libc-aarch64-linux-gnu-7.5.0.drv-0/build/./gcc/xgcc -B/tmp/guix-build-gcc-cross-sans-libc-aarch64-linux-gnu-7.5.0.drv-0/build/./gcc/ -E -dM - | \
  sed -n -e 's/^#define \([^_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*\).*/\1/p' \
	 -e 's/^#define \(_[^_A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*\).*/\1/p' | \
  sort -u > tmp-macro_list
cc1: error: no include path in which to search for stdc-predef.h
/gnu/store/7sfbiqh21h90bc6zi8br1xh60m6qgdd5-bash-minimal-5.0.16/bin/bash ../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc/../move-if-change tmp-macro_list macro_list
echo timestamp > s-macro_list
rm -rf include-fixed; mkdir include-fixed
chmod a+rx include-fixed
if [ -d ../prev-gcc ]; then \
  cd ../prev-gcc && \
  make real-install-headers-tar DESTDIR=`pwd`/../gcc/ \
    libsubdir=. ; \
else \
  set -e; for ml in `cat fixinc_list`; do \
    sysroot_headers_suffix=`echo ${ml} | sed -e 's/;.*$//'`; \
    multi_dir=`echo ${ml} | sed -e 's/^[^;]*;//'`; \
    fix_dir=include-fixed${multi_dir}; \
    if ! false && test ! -d `echo /usr/include | sed -e :a -e 's,[^/]*/\.\.\/,,' -e ta`; then \
      echo The directory that should contain system headers does not exist: >&2 ; \
      echo "  `echo /usr/include | sed -e :a -e 's,[^/]*/\.\.\/,,' -e ta`" >&2 ; \
      tooldir_sysinc=`echo "/gnu/store/rgyhaqm61d0cwklqb3hhpr2c8pp4lv41-gcc-cross-sans-libc-aarch64-linux-gnu-7.5.0-lib/lib/gcc/aarch64-linux-gnu/7.5.0/../../../../../../../aarch64-linux-gnu/sys-include" | sed -e :a -e "s,[^/]*/\.\.\/,," -e ta`; \
      if test "x`echo /usr/include | sed -e :a -e 's,[^/]*/\.\.\/,,' -e ta`" = "x${tooldir_sysinc}"; \
      then sleep 1; else exit 1; fi; \
    fi; \
    /gnu/store/7sfbiqh21h90bc6zi8br1xh60m6qgdd5-bash-minimal-5.0.16/bin/bash ../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc/../mkinstalldirs ${fix_dir}; \
    chmod a+rx ${fix_dir} || true; \
    (TARGET_MACHINE='aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu'; srcdir=`cd ../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc; ${PWDCMD-pwd}`; \
      SHELL='/gnu/store/7sfbiqh21h90bc6zi8br1xh60m6qgdd5-bash-minimal-5.0.16/bin/bash'; MACRO_LIST=`${PWDCMD-pwd}`/macro_list ; \
      gcc_dir=`${PWDCMD-pwd}` ; \
      export TARGET_MACHINE srcdir SHELL MACRO_LIST && \
      cd ../build-aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu/fixincludes && \
      /gnu/store/7sfbiqh21h90bc6zi8br1xh60m6qgdd5-bash-minimal-5.0.16/bin/bash ./fixinc.sh "${gcc_dir}/${fix_dir}" \
        `echo /usr/include | sed -e :a -e 's,[^/]*/\.\.\/,,' -e ta`  ); \
    rm -f ${fix_dir}/syslimits.h; \
    if [ -f ${fix_dir}/limits.h ]; then \
      mv ${fix_dir}/limits.h ${fix_dir}/syslimits.h; \
    else \
      cp ../../gcc-7.5.0/gcc/gsyslimits.h ${fix_dir}/syslimits.h; \
    fi; \
    chmod a+r ${fix_dir}/syslimits.h; \
  done; \
fi
The directory that should contain system headers does not exist:
  /usr/include
make[3]: *** [Makefile:3009: stmp-fixinc] Error 1
make[3]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
make[3]: Leaving directory '/tmp/guix-build-gcc-cross-sans-libc-aarch64-linux-gnu-7.5.0.drv-0/build/gcc'
make[2]: *** [Makefile:4492: all-stage1-gcc] Error 2
make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/guix-build-gcc-cross-sans-libc-aarch64-linux-gnu-7.5.0.drv-0/build'
make[1]: *** [Makefile:17230: stage1-bubble] Error 2
make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/guix-build-gcc-cross-sans-libc-aarch64-linux-gnu-7.5.0.drv-0/build'
make: *** [Makefile:881: all] Error 2
command "make" "-j" "6" "CFLAGS=-g0 -O2" failed with status 2
```

[Full build log](https://gist.github.com/fanquake/41c61850e12e50a48492827d1af3127e).
title: guix: building for `aarch64-linux-gnu` on aarch64 fails
